# allowedPressTypes

**Instance Property**

An array of press types used to distinguish the type of button press.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowedPressTypes: [NSNumber] { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property is an array of `UIPressTypes` that activates the gesture recognizer to distinguish the type of button press. The default press type is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType/select]. When this property is set to an empty array, the gesture recognizer will respond to taps like a touch pad like surface. For a list of possible press types, see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress/PressType] enumeration in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress].

## Recognizing different gestures

- **allowedTouchTypes**: An array of touch types used to distinguish type of touches.
- **requiresExclusiveTouchType**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the gesture recognizer considers touches of different types simultaneously.
